Member Enumeration Documentation

enum ibase::IRuntimeStatusProvider::RuntimeStatus
Enumerator:
RS_NONE 

No status.

RS_STARTING 

Process starting up.

RS_RUNNING 

Process is running.

RS_SHUTDOWN 

Process is in shutdown phase.
